text: The crisis in Canada's healthcare system is a prime example of what happens when government intervention and defunding go too far. It's unacceptable that the union leaderships have blocked any genuine struggle against privatization by healthcare workers. The result? Telus, a massive telecommunications monopoly, has entered the lucrative healthcare game. Meanwhile, Medicare remains popular among Canadian workers, but privatization is treated as a political taboo. It's time for real change and to put an end to the cycle of defunding and privatization in our healthcare system."
